DOC.brief_summary: The survey is conducted to collect safety and effectiveness information in Hypertensive patients treated with Micombi Tablets on the long term use in daily clinical settings in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Micombi Tablets Survey on the Long-term Use
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Hypertensive patients who have never taken Micombi Tablets. Exclusion criteria:
